enhanced_description: HopeQure offers a HIPAA Compliant and fully automated platform providing affordable online counselling and therapy. Services include online psychological counselling for mental health and relationship issues, delivered by over 550 globally qualified and background-verified psychologists, psychiatrists, and counselors. Clients can book sessions, enroll in time-bound therapy programs, access free self-assessments, and utilize a Knowledge Hub with researched blogs. HopeQure also provides a leading Employee Assistance Program (EAP) to MNCs and top corporates in India for unlimited counselling and employee productivity improvement. Specific counselling options are available for dating couples, married couples, and students/teens, addressing issues like stress, anxiety, depression, trust, intimacy, and family matters.
